title: Redcare: Online Pharmacy
description:
With Shop Apotheke / Redcare you always have your pharmacy and drugstore at hand. Order medicine, cosmetics and many other products conveniently at low prices, fill your prescription or e-prescription and get online advice from a doctor.

We offer everything you need. Discover a huge selection with over 100,000 products and have your order delivered quickly to your home. With our app, we can deliver your orders to the following countries: Germany, Austria, Italy Belgium and France.

🪪  E-prescription on your health insurance card: Redeem your e-prescription digitally now
All you need is your German health insurance card and the Shop Apotheke app!
 
How do you redeem an e-prescription with your electronic health card?
1️⃣Open the Shop Apotheke app.
2️⃣ Enter the card number. (Your card number consists of 6 numbers and is located under the word "Gesundheitskarte")
3️⃣ Enter your mobile phone number and the 2-factor authentication code that you will receive by text message
4️⃣ Hold your electronic health card on your phone and everything will be delivered to your home.

✅ The e-prescription (eRx) has been officially launched in Germany.
Does your prescription have a code? Then it's an e-prescription printout. With our integrated e-prescription scanner, you can scan the code and order your medication faster - e-prescription scanned by 6 p.m., delivered by tomorrow*. So you have more time for what really matters - your health!

What are the advantages of the Shop Apotheke / Redcare app?

✅ Choose from a huge selection of medicine, cosmetics & much more
✅ Compare prices on the go using our barcode scanner
✅ Collect your prescription or e-prescription safely and conveniently
✅ Get your delivery very fast with Now! service
✅ Enjoy regular discounts and voucher promotions
✅ Log in safely and securely
 
We offer a wide range of products in the categories:

● Medications & prescription medicines
● Baby & family
● Beauty & care
● Nutrition, sports & weight loss
● Homeopathy & natural products
● Care & Medical supply store
● Pet pharmacy & pet supplies
● Books & much more!

🚛 Our Now! delivery service enables fast delivery for thousands of products across our range. Simply place your order with NOW! products in the app and depending on the time of your order, we will deliver it on the same or the following day*. To ensure fast delivery, we ship orders three times a day.

🛒 Discover a huge selection, from medicines to cosmetics, from well-known brands such as Hexal, Aspirin, or Vichy. With our own brands, we also offer a wide range of high-quality products in the categories of medicine, cosmetics, beauty, fitness, and nutrition.

 🏆 Highest quality and safety are essential for us. Our pharmacy has been certified by TÜV Nord and has been chosen as Webshop of the Year 2020/2021. We have been awarded the Trusted e-Shops label “very good” and have already impressed over 9 million satisfied customers.
 
💳 Pay securely and easily with Visa, Mastercard, PayPal, Klarna, direct debit, prepayment or purchase on account.

🔴 Take advantage of our customer loyalty program. Collect RedPoints with every purchase to receive discounts and exclusive benefits.

🔒You are safe with us! The data transmission takes place via a secured end-to-end encryption so that the data protection is optimally ensured.
Download the Shop Apotheke app today and get a reliable companion in matters of health and beauty care.

*excludes prescription orders

***Applies to e-prescriptions redeemed by 6pm (Mon-Fri). E-prescriptions received from Fri 6pm to Sun 12pm will be delivered on Tuesday. Further legal information can be found in the app & on our website.
 
Contact
Send feedback to: mobile@shop-apotheke.com
